Key:
(Today was my first day off since Kaguya and
I started officially dating. A date with just the
two of us. I was kind of nervous...)

Well, that's fine, but...
Why are you here, Yuzuru?

Answer. Shido, I am waiting with you for Kaguya
to arrive. I assume waiting is a turgid affair.

Well, that's sweet of you. I was kind of bored,
so I appreciate it. Did you want to come with
us, since you're already here?

Refusal. That I cannot do. You are Kaguya's
boyfriend. You must appreciate your time
alone together.

Oh, you think so? Well, I'm sure Kaguya wouldn't
mind. In fact, she might encourage it.

Affirmative. Kaguya loves Yuzuru. However,
alone time is important. Rules must be honored.
If you say so. Oh. I think she's here.
Sorry for running late, Shido.
Hey, Yuzuru! Oh, thinking of coming with?

Refusal. Unfortunately, I will not join. I merely
wanted to see you off.

Thanks for coming out, Yuzuru. Well, we'll
be on our way.

Warning. Shido, one word of advice. Kaguya's
tastes are notoriously finicky. Good luck.
O-Okay...
Departure. Well, I will be on my way.
Good luck...? What does she mean?

Shido, let's get going. If you keep me waiting,
the dark beast will awaken!

Oh. Let's go. You had somewhere in mind,
right?
Yes. Come with me!
(Kaguya took me to...)
Is this a clothing shop?

Hehe. Indeed. I'm gonna pick the coooolest
clothes for you, Shido!
That's sweet of you. Wait, but you're picking?
C-Can't I?

Well, I mean, I've never had a girl pick out
clothes for me before.

Kuku... Then prepare yourself for the most
epic transformation this decade. Okay, go
inside that room.
G-Got it...

(Kaguya excitedly shoved me into a dressing
room, but...)
All of a sudden, I feel anxious.

(Should I really let her choose? Well, she
is my girlfriend. I should trust her. But wait
a minute... Kaguya's fashion sense is―)

Thanks for waiting! I had my eye on some stuff,
so I went ahead and bought it! I'll leave it here
for you. Call me, okay? I'm getting ready too!
...Getting ready?

(Is Kaguya changing too? Are we going to
match? That'd be embarrassing. Oh, well.
Guess I'll find out. Where are those clothes?)

(Oh, man. This is totally Kaguya's aesthetic.
It looks cool.)

But I feel like it's bringing me back to a time
I didn't necessarily want to remember...

(Well, guess I have to commit. I'm Kaguya's
boyfriend.)

(I mustered up the courage to try on the
black coat.)

(Together, Kaguya and I walked through the
shopping district.)
Shido, I knew it! Looking so cool!
Y-You think so...?

Kuku... Totally, Shido. The perfect look for my
servant.
Kaguya, I'm happy you like what you see.
Hm?
You look adorable, Kaguya.

...Huhhh? Talk more like that and you'll make
me blush.
Why? You wanted to be twins, right?

N-NNNNNNot really! I just thought it looked
cute! I thought you might look good in it, too.

I see. You're right. It suits you, Kaguya.
A real cute outfit.
Hauuu. Hehehe. Thanks, Shido. You look cool too.
Think so? I kinda feel like it doesn't suit me.

Don't worry. I can vouch for how cool you look,
so trust me. You're my boyfriend, Shido.
Haha. I get all pumped whenever you say it.
(I won't tell her about that, though...)

(I'm sure, in our matching outfits, we really do
look like a serious couple. It was nice to see
Kaguya wear such a big smile.)
All right. Onward and upward with our date!
Wait, in this outfit?!

KAKAKA, Shido! A rendezvous demands
matching attire. You can't take it off
until the very end!
Fine. I'll play along just for today, Princess.
Okay...!
But only today, okay?

Kuku. You chose me, Shido. Your requests
are trivial.
I see. That's how you're going to play it, huh?

(It's true I chose Kaguya. So I guess I can't
really be surprised it panned out like this.
Yuzuru's warning was lost on me...)

Besides, if you resist, I won't let go of your
arms.
That's not a threat. I don't want you to let go.
Then let's keep this good thing goin'.
